text: Diosdado "Dado" Madarang Peralta (born March 27, 1952) is a Filipino jurist. He was appointed as the 26th Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of the Philippines by President Rodrigo Duterte on October 23, 2019. He was Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the Philippines from January 13, 2009 to October 22, 2019. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Chief justices of the Supreme Court of the Philippines Category:People from Ilocos Norte
title: Diosdado Peralta
